description:
Do you wish you could minimize all your active cards and just have a nice clean wallpaper or just show the date and time? ClearCard gives you a similar capability to keep your apps open and your wallpaper visible. By appearing almost entirely invisible, ClearCard can sit front and center on your Pre or Pixi , without blocking the view of your wallpaper.
When your wallpaper changes, ClearCard automatically adjusts to continue appearing invisible. When maximized, ClearCard displays your wallpaper full screen, completely clean. Watch the video or click on the Support link below if you have questions about ClearCard ***Changle log 1.0.9 Added ability to auto center ClearCard when the screen turns off, fixed clock bug that would chop off minutes - 1.0.8 Fixed Pixi display for WebOS 1.4, added a force refresh option for when wallpaper gets stuck in prefs - 1.0.5 Added time/date widget v1.0.4 Fixed screen redraw/resize when screen was unlocked if ClearCard is maximized v1.0.3 Now includes a Preferences menu to disable tap toggle and ability to set default display mode --- v1.0.2 includes ability to view full screen via tap and hold, icon updated
